text:
A video shows Chicago police giving a CTA supervisor a choice: Drop a complaint against an officer or face arrest. 

“Is it worth it to you?” a sergeant asked. 

It was. Minutes later, she was in handcuffs. https://t.co/EKSdWSjohm
